meanings.definition: A type of crustacean resembling a shrimp.
meanings.sent1: The squillas scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a squillas swimming gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squillas bring a tiny umbrella to the beach?
meanings.sent4: The squillas danced in the waves like miniature ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The squillas' delicate antennae waved in the current.

meanings.sent1: The cat squillas across the room to catch the toy.
meanings.sent2: I squillas out of bed when I heard the alarm.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel squillas up the tree to escape the dog.
meanings.sent4: Time seems to squillas by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The athlete squillas past the finish line, winning the race.
